thread.title: 7 things that will definitely happen on Liverpool's transfer deadline day
thread.title_full: 7 things that will definitely happen on Liverpool's transfer deadline day

author: Mark Jones
title: 7 things that will definitely happen on Liverpool's transfer deadline day
text:
Sport 7 things that will definitely happen on Liverpool's transfer deadline day The Reds aren't likely to be too busy on the final day of the transfer window, and we've worked out exactly what is going to happen Share Will Jurgen Klopp be a busy man on ransfer deadline day? Er... no (Photo: Getty) Share Get Liverpool   quiet transfer window for Liverpool , with Jurgen Klopp ignoring calls to strengthen his squad ahead of the second half of the season. 
Recent form suggests that the German boss might have been better off bringing at least one new face in, but given just how hard he works his players then he's obviously happier trusting in those he already has at his disposal. 
But despite that, it still promises to be an eventful day on Merseyside ahead of the Reds' meeting with Chelsea on Tuesday evening. Read More 
Here's what's likely to go down on deadline day . Someone will make the 'Liverpool sign Bent' joke The Babelcopter will get a mention, probably from Ryan Babel himself Yevhen Konoplyanka's name will appear somewhere Remember him? (Photo: Getty) Mamadou Sakho will refuse moves to 27 different clubs, before finally getting the message It's not you, Mama, it's us   There'll be a late, completely made-up link with someone quite exciting, but it won't happen You'll remember that it is six years to the day since Luis Suarez signed, and have a little wistful sigh Which turns into a groan when you remember the Andy Carroll fee Two Liverpool legends... and Big Andy (Photo: Alex Livesey) poll loading Should Liverpool have done more in this transfer window? 0+ VOTES SO FAR Yes, a fresh face was needed No, the squad is good enough Like us on Facebook
